title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project's scope, objectives, and requirements, including the types of housing components to be produced, desired customization options, target production capacity, and any specific constraints or regulations.

title: Design 3D Printing System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the 3D printing system, including the hardware components (printers, material handling systems, etc.), software systems (control software, design tools, etc.), and integration with other systems (ERP, inventory management, supply chain management, etc.). Consider scalability, modularity, maintainability, performance optimizations, security, fault tolerance, disaster recovery, and monitoring and logging.

title: Develop 3D Printing Software
description: Develop the software components required for the 3D printing system, including printer control software, design tools, and integration with other systems.

title: Design and Implement Housing Component Library
description: Design and develop a library of customizable housing components that can be easily configured and 3D printed, including structural components, interior finishes, and exterior facades.

title: Establish Production Workflow and Processes
description: Define and implement the production workflow and processes, including order management, material handling, quality control, and logistics.

title: Set up Infrastructure and Facilities
description: Plan and set up the necessary infrastructure and facilities for the 3D printing factory, including the physical space, utilities, material storage, and any required environmental controls.

title: Implement Security and Compliance Measures
description: Ensure the system and processes comply with relevant regulations and industry standards, and implement appropriate security measures to protect intellectual property and customer data.

title: Develop Testing and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Establish a comprehensive testing and quality assurance plan to ensure the 3D printed housing components meet the required specifications and standards.

title: Create User Documentation and Training Materials
description: Develop user documentation, training materials, and support resources for customers, operators, and maintenance personnel.
dependencies: Design and Implement Housing Component Library

title: Plan and Execute Pilot Production Run
description: Conduct a pilot production run to test and validate the entire system, processes, and workflows, and identify any issues or areas for improvement.
dependencies: Design and Implement Housing Component Library
Develop Testing and Quality Assurance Plan
